name: Fluff Brawl Bros.
description:
Versus fluffy fighting game

Keyboard vs. Controller required

Instructions:

WSAD and left thumbstick - Movement
Space and A - Jump
Abilities:
Shift or R button/ X Controller - Martyrdom
Shift/ Right Shoulder controller - Dash

Assets used:

SideFX Labs plugin for VAT shaders

OST available separately here:

https://shurrikane.itch.io/fluff-brawl-bros-ost
